channel.title: Your Own Backyard
channel.itunes:summary: A documentary podcast series investigating the 1996 disappearance of Cal Poly student, Kristin Smart.
channel.itunes:author: Chris Lambert
channel.description: A documentary podcast series investigating the 1996 disappearance of Cal Poly student, Kristin Smart.

item.title: People vs. Flores: Defense and Rebuttal
item.description: Chris recaps the Defense case and the State's rebuttal from the Salinas Courthouse

item.title: People vs. Flores #1: Motions
item.description: Chris recaps the pre-trial events following the 2021 preliminary hearing, through the first week of motions in the Salinas Courthouse

item.title: Episode 10: The Beginning of The End Part 2
item.description: Chris travels down to the South Bay, and attempts to trace Paul Flores' predatory behavior from its origins to the present day.
item.content:encoded: Chris travels down to the South Bay, and attempts to trace Paul Flores' predatory behavior from its origins to the present day.
item.itunes:subtitle: Chris travels down to the South Bay, and attempts to trace Paul Flores' predatory behavior from its origins to the present day.

item.title: Episode 09: The Beginning of The End Part 1
item.description: After the April 2021 arrests of Paul Flores and his father, Ruben, Chris recounts the search that led to them, and a timeline of the spot where investigators believe Kristin Smart's body was buried.
item.content:encoded: After the April 2021 arrests of Paul Flores and his father, Ruben, Chris recounts the search that led to them, and a timeline of the spot where investigators believe Kristin Smart's body was buried.
item.itunes:subtitle: After the April 2021 arrests of Paul Flores and his father, Ruben, Chris recounts the search that led to them, and a timeline of the spot where investigators believe Kristin Smart's body was buried.

item.title: Episode 08: The 16-Hour Gap
item.description: Where was Paul Flores over Memorial Day Weekend 1996? Chris scours the Smart Family’s notebooks to find forgotten witnesses and leads.
item.content:encoded: Where was Paul Flores over Memorial Day Weekend 1996? Chris scours the Smart Family’s notebooks to find forgotten witnesses and leads.
item.itunes:subtitle: Where was Paul Flores over Memorial Day Weekend 1996? Chris scours the Smart Family’s notebooks to find forgotten witnesses and leads.

item.title: Episode 07: The Iceberg
item.description: The San Luis Obispo County Sheriff's Office speaks.
item.content:encoded: The San Luis Obispo County Sheriff's Office speaks.
item.itunes:subtitle: The San Luis Obispo County Sheriff's Office speaks.

item.title: Episode 06: Ongoing and Active
item.description: A newspaper publisher thinks he's found Kristin Smart, until he hits a brick wall.
item.content:encoded: A newspaper publisher thinks he's found Kristin Smart, until he hits a brick wall.
item.itunes:subtitle: A newspaper publisher thinks he's found Kristin Smart, until he hits a brick wall.

item.title: Episode 05: The P
item.description: Psychics, parents, Parkinson, and Poly.
item.content:encoded: Psychics, parents, Parkinson, and Poly.
item.itunes:subtitle: Psychics, parents, Parkinson, and Poly.

item.title: Episode 04: Son Of Susan
item.description: A man from North Carolina vows to keep the Flores family on their toes, and accidentally finds a new way to get their backyard searched in the process.
item.content:encoded: A man from North Carolina vows to keep the Flores family on their toes, and accidentally finds a new way to get their backyard searched in the process.
item.itunes:subtitle: A man from North Carolina vows to keep the Flores family on their toes, and accidentally finds a new way to get their backyard searched in the process.

item.title: Episode 03: Their Own Backyard
item.description: If Kristin Smart is dead, where did her body end up? Chris follows a trail left by a lost piece of evidence, and retraces Paul Flores’ movements in the years after.
item.content:encoded: If Kristin Smart is dead, where did her body end up? Chris follows a trail left by a lost piece of evidence, and retraces Paul Flores’ movements in the years after.
item.itunes:subtitle: If Kristin Smart is dead, where did her body end up? Chris follows a trail left by a lost piece of evidence, and retraces Paul Flores’ movements in the years after.

item.title: Episode 02: The Only Suspect
item.description: Who is Paul Flores? Chris talks to women who knew him before he was the suspect in Kristin Smart's disappearance, and learns that none of them were surprised.
item.content:encoded: Who is Paul Flores? Chris talks to women who knew him before he was the suspect in Kristin Smart's disappearance, and learns that none of them were surprised.
item.itunes:subtitle: Who is Paul Flores? Chris talks to women who knew him before he was the suspect in Kristin Smart's disappearance, and learns that none of them were surprised.

item.title: Episode 01: A Face On A Billboard
item.description: Who is Kristin Smart? Chris travels to Stockton to meet her parents, Stan and Denise, along with her friends, neighbors, and classmates.
item.content:encoded: Who is Kristin Smart? Chris travels to Stockton to meet her parents, Stan and Denise, along with her friends, neighbors, and classmates.
item.itunes:subtitle: Who is Kristin Smart? Chris travels to Stockton to meet her parents, Stan and Denise, along with her friends, neighbors, and classmates.

item.title: Episode 00: Coming Soon
item.description: Your Own Backyard: The Disappearance of Kristin Smart starts September 30th. Subscribe now.
item.content:encoded: Your Own Backyard: The Disappearance of Kristin Smart starts September 30th. Subscribe now.
item.itunes:subtitle: Your Own Backyard: The Disappearance of Kristin Smart starts September 30th. Subscribe now.
